sense.gloss: popularity, favour, favor, reception
defense, defence, reputation
agreement
receiver of technique (e.g. in martial arts)
bottom (submissive partner of a homosexual relationship)
to receive, to get
to catch (e.g. a ball)
to be struck by (wind, waves, sunlight, etc.)
to sustain (damage), to incur (a loss), to suffer (an injury), to feel (influence)
to undergo (e.g. surgery), to take (a test), to accept (a challenge)
to be given (e.g. life, talent)
to find funny, to find humorous, to be amused (by)
to follow, to succeed, to be descended from
to face (south, etc.)
to be modified by
to obtain (a pawned item, etc.) by paying a fee
to be well-received, to become popular, to go down well
receiving, acceptance, reception
taking an examination (esp. for entrance to a school or university)
winning (a prize), receiving (an award), being awarded
receiving (a message, letter, email, etc.), reception (radio, TV, etc.)
taking a lecture, attending a class, taking a course
reception (desk), information desk, receptionist, information clerk
receipt, acceptance
to accept, to receive, to agree
to receive, to get, to accept
to take, to interpret, to understand

sdata.j: ↑殺人↑↓さつじん↓↑犯↑↓はん↓は↑有罪↑↓ゆうざい↓↑判決↑↓はんけつ↓を↑受↑↓う↓けて↑終身↑↓しゅうしん↓↑刑↑↓けい↓に↑処↑↓しょ↓せられた。
sdata.e: The murderer was convicted and sentenced to life in prison.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑忠告↑↓ちゅうこく↓を↑受↑↓う↓け↑入↑↓い↓れるべきだったのに。
sdata.e: You should have accepted his advice.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑先生↑↓せんせい↓の↑許可↑↓きょか↓を↑受↑↓う↓けるべきだ。
sdata.e: You ought to ask for your teacher's permission.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑準備↑↓じゅんび↓なしに↑受験↑↓じゅけん↓するなんて↑馬鹿↑↓ばか↓なことをすべきでなかったね。
sdata.e: You should have known better than to take an examination without preparing for it.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑試験↑↓しけん↓に↑受↑↓う↓かるように↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: You should study hard so that you can pass the examination.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はものごとをあるがままに↑受↑↓う↓け↑入↑↓い↓れなければいけない。
sdata.e: You must take things as they are.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑試験↑↓しけん↓に↑受↑↓う↓かったのだから、↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓で↑運転↑↓うんてん↓できるよ。
sdata.e: Now that you have passed your test, you can drive on your own.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑受↑↓う↓けますか。
sdata.e: Will you take on the job?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑結果↑↓けっか↓を↑甘受↑↓かんじゅ↓すべきだ。
sdata.e: You should abide by the consequences.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑贈↑↓おく↓り↑物↑↓もの↓を↑受↑↓う↓け↑取↑↓と↓ることはできない。
